itemLabel: Eric Sharp, Baron Sharp of Grimsdyke

wikipedia_page.main: Eric Sharp, Baron Sharp of Grimsdyke,  (17 August 1916 – 2 May 1994) was a British businessman and Member of the House of Lords.

response: #REDIRECT Eric Sharp, Baron Sharp of Grimsdyke

Richard Sharp was born on 8 February 1956, in London. He is the son of Eric Sharp, Baron Sharp of Grimsdyke, who was chairman of Cable & Wireless plc from 1980 to 1990. His twin sister, Dame Victoria Sharp, is president of the Queen's Bench Division of the High Court in England and Wales.
